name: GrandTraveler
description:
Hello! Welcome to GrandTraveler World!

this game is 2D TopDown RPG Game!

and this game is not turn-based game!

You can Play with keyboard or Mouse!

protagonist is `WooJu` , `Wooju` have a dream, the dream is to be GrandTraveler!

GrandTraveler have strong magic and dynamic skill!

The continent he lives in is called Grancia.

A person who freely handles the four spirit magic(wind, water, fire, thunder) is called a Grand Traveler.

You go on adventures and find treasure.

You can find and defeat monster, elemental boss, another Grandtraveler boss, and you can get vairety items, quest in Gransia!

Gransia have a many cute, scary 2d monsters!

this Game`s Main stroy is how `Wooju` becomes a GrandTraveler and Defeat GrandTraveler Ganurial!

Let`s start Grandtraveler!

Thank you!
